mapper.update: update nursingLevel set create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level_name = #{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level_status = #{levelStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, level_name, level_status from nursingLevel where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
